appraisal.reason: Per this newsletter, Saturday confessions are 10.00–11.00 and 5.00–5.50pm, not 5.00–6.00pm. Weekday confessions remain 12.00–12.20pm and Sunday confessions 10.00–10.30am and 12.00–12.30pm. Please note the 10-minute earlier finish on Saturday evening.

name: Our Lady of Mount Carmel & St Simon Stock

appraisal.reason: Per the newsletter, confessions are Monday–Friday 12:00–12:55, Saturday 11:00–12:00 and 17:45–17:55, and on Sundays fifteen minutes before every Mass. Your Sunday listing is incomplete as it omits the 'fifteen minutes' specification.
